[`FolderOption`](FolderOption)

## FolderOption interface

A text input allowing selection of a folder from in the vault.

 1.10.2

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface FolderOption extends BaseOption 
```
**Extends:** [`BaseOption`](BaseOption)
